question: 宇宙人
sourceMnemonic: You know how <ja>宇宙</ja> is <kanji>space</kanji>? Well, a <kanji>person</kanji> from space is an <vocabulary>alien</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well. It will also help to know how to read the word <ja>宇宙</ja> on its own, too.
